channel.title: Home on Flowing fragments by Sylwia Całka-Verhulst
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Flowing fragments by Sylwia Całka-Verhulst

item.title: Output
item.description: I’m struggling to find focus for myself at work. In the recent years, the ratio of my content consumption is 9 to 10. I am reading, watching, listening in order to find inspiration for my creative or personal projects. What I noticed that it never brings me any closer to creating any of those creative things.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
